first_translate: don’t try to steal someone else’s man.
because he belongs to me right now.

hangle: 이 정도에 꼬리를 말 거면 왜 시비를 거는지 몰라.
first_translate: if she was gonna run off like that, why did she even start anything?

hangle: 정신 차려. 어제는 이보다 더 했잖아.
first_translate: come on! we’ve done more than this before.

hangle: 네가 하는 거랑 내가 하는 건 느낌이 다르다고….
first_translate: it feels different when you do it versus when I do it...

hangle: 그래도 그냥 입술에 가볍게 했을 뿐이잖아?
first_translate: still, all I did was brush my lips against yours.
let us give up our seats then...!
you need to prepare for tomorrow’s departure!
we will take a short break here!

hangle: 도착할 때까지 유니스 영애와 같은 마차는 절대 못 탈 거야
first_translate: now I won’t ever be able to ride in the same carriage as lady eunis again.
is it such a big deal?

hangle: 좀 친해져서 유니스의 힘을 확인하려 했단 말이다.
first_translate: I wanted to become closer friends so I could check out her powers.

hangle: 그런데 코앞에서 사람 협박하고, 사랑과 전쟁을 실시간으로 찍어버렸네…
first_translate: but not only did I threaten people right in front of her, but also had a full-blown fight over romance...
god knows what kind of impression I left on her...
do you like her that much...?

hangle: 티 파티 이후로 우리를 볼 때마다 발그레 해지는 것도 그렇고.
first_translate: and every time she sees us after the tea party, she blushes.
I can’t believe these two are supposed to fall in love...

hangle: 너희 둘이 사랑을 해야 유니스가 각성을 하고 세계를 구한다고….
first_translate: unless they do, eunis won’t awaken and save the world...

hangle: 그 방법이 안 될 것 같으니,
이번에 가는 죽은 땅에서 뭔가 힌트라도 얻길 바라는 수밖에….
first_translate: all I can hope for is finding some clues about how to fix everything while we’re heading into dead lands...

hangle: 시그렌, 나 잠깐 어디 좀 다녀올게!
first_translate: siegren, I’m stepping outside for a bit!
to rescue a damsel in distress!

hangle: 혼자 있으니까 조금 마음이 편해지는 기분이야.
first_translate: it feels nice being alone sometimes.

hangle: 행렬에는 사람이 너무 많아서 괜히 지쳐….
first_translate: there were just too many people in the procession, which made me tired...
hey missy, what brings you here?
want to play together for a little bit?
let go of that girl nicely,
then return to where you belong.
who does he think he is?
apparently, he doesn’t know who eunis or I am.
in that case, I guess I’ll show him myself.
miss, you shouldn’t get your hands dirty.

hangle: 권터 씨네 사람인 줄은 미처 몰랐습니다.
first_translate: I-I didn’t realize you belonged to mr. gunter.

hangle: 아가씨는 놔드릴 테니 한 번 봐주시죠.
first_translate: I’ll release the young woman if you look past this incident.
okay, since we returned the lady safely, we shall excuse ourselves--

hangle: 너희를 이대로 보내면 내가 공작한테 더러운 꼴을 당해서.
first_translate: no way. if I send you guys off without doing something, duke bernhart would kill me.
should I cut off their balls?
